bfw_properties.bfw_property: This folder is where you should compose or upload the work you want to turn in. If there is a due date, you must click "Submit" once everything is how you want it. To create a cover page for this folder, click "Personalize this Folder".

objective.description: Rhetorical Knowledge
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Focus on a purpose
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Respond to the needs of different audiences
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Respond appropriately to different kinds of rhetorical situations
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Use conventions of format and structure appropriate to the rhetorical situation
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Adopt appropriate voice, tone, and level of formality
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Understand how genres shape reading and writing

objective.description: Write in several genres

objective.description: Critical Thinking Reading and Writing
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Use writing and reading for inquiry, learning, thinking, and communicating
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Understand a writing assignment as a series of tasks, including finding, evaluating, analyzing, and synthesizing appropriate primary and secondary sources
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Integrate their own ideas with those of others
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Understand the relationships among language, knowledge, and power
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Processes
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Be aware that it usually takes multiple drafts to create and complete a successful text
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Develop flexible strategies for generating, revising, editing, and proof-reading
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Understand writing as an open process that permits writers to use later invention and re-thinking to revise their work
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Understand the collaborative and social aspects of writing processes
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Learn to critique their own and others' works
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Learn to balance the advantages of relying on others with the responsibility of doing their part
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Use a variety of technologies to address a range of audiences
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Knowledge of Conventions

objective.description: Learn common formats for different kinds of texts

objective.description: Develop knowledge of genre conventions ranging from structure and paragraphing to tone and mechanics

objective.description: Practice appropriate means of documenting their work

objective.description: Control such surface features as syntax, grammar, punctuation, and spelling
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Composing in Electronic Environments
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Use electronic environments for drafting, reviewing, revising, editing, and sharing texts
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Locate, evaluate, organize, and use research material collected from electronic sources, including scholarly library databases; other official databases and informal electronic networks and internet sources
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Understand and exploit the differences in the rhetorical strategies and in the affordances available for both print and electronic composing processes and texts
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

data.title: Portfolio Teaching
data.description: Provides the practical information instructors and writing program administrators need to use the portfolio method successfully in a writing course. Ideal companion to Portfolio Keeping, a guide for students, also by Nedra Reynolds and Rich Rice.

bfw_properties.bfw_property: A Guide for Instructors, Second Edition

data.description:
Portfolio Teaching
A Guide for Instructors, Second Edition
by Nedra Reynolds and Rich Rice
Provides the practical information instructors and writing program administrators need to use the portfolio method successfully in a writing course. Ideal companion to Portfolio Keeping, a guide for students, also by Nedra Reynolds and Rich Rice.

data.title: Portfolio Keeping
data.description: Brief and inexpensive, Portfolio Keeping is the first guide that provides information students need to use the portfolio method successfully in a writing course. Portfolio Teaching, a guide for instructors, is also available.

bfw_properties.bfw_property: A Guide for Students, Second Edition

data.description:
Portfolio Keeping
A Guide for Students, Second Edition
by Nedra Reynolds and Rich Rice
Brief and inexpensive, Portfolio Keeping is the first guide that provides information students need to use the portfolio method successfully in a writing course. Portfolio Teaching, a guide for instructors, is also available.

template.name: Add a Reflection Assignment
template.message: You may also want to add a reflection assignment for this folder.
